file_content.text: You've made quite a name for yourself in victory, hunter.
Mandalore himself requested your presence aboard his flagship. He wants to congratulate his champion personally.
We're getting an audience with Mandalore? You gotta be kidding! I can hardly believe it.
That makes two of us, Mako.
Me either.
Who says I'm taking you with me?
You assume you're coming?
Fine! Just forget your friends on the way to the top.
Not bad. You're moving up in the galaxy.
It's good to see that things are panning out.
Seems so.
I better be, I didn't do all this for a pat on the back and a trophy.
That was the point.
Ha. Don't worry, you'll be getting a lot more than that.
That's a rare honor.
I'll be sure to pay him a visit.
I'll be there.
No more bit jobs and small paychecks for me.
Future's looking bright.
No, definitely not. Great Hunt winners are destined for great things.
Well, lucky me.
Couldn't care less.
I'd think real hard before you decide to snub Mandalore's invitation.
The Huntmaster will address you now.
You come before me again, whole and strong. You have emerged from the fire a tempered, honed and deadly weapon.
I welcome you as one worthy to fight alongside any of us as an equal.
I consider myself fortunate, Huntmaster.
I'm honored to be here.
You have joined a rare and select group, champion.
I can't wait for the opportunity to do so.
I'll look forward to that.
Shoulder to shoulder in war or alone in the hunt, you will always fight alongside us, champion.
How many of you have won the Great Hunt?
Equal? I'm the winner here.
Aside from you, I am the only former Grand Champion of the Great Hunt in this room. We are few.
Your name will be listed alongside such legendary hunters as Soongh the Cunning, Bloodworthy, the Defenestrator, Jewl'a Nightbringer and Mandalore himself.
It is with great pride that I name you the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt! Mandalorians, salute Mandalore's champion!
